website_summaries.verdict: The D7 features a spiral combo brush and lets you choose whether your vacuum will work in eco or turbo mode.
pros: Works with Amazon Alexa for voice control
WiFi connected for remote app control
Cleans precisely by using LaserSmart mapping scans and maps room
Lets you know when it needs to be emptied
Runs up to 120 minutes between charges
cons: A few bugs to work out with mapping and charging functions, as is often the case with higher-feature electronics

customer_reviews.title: Not a good product
customer_reviews.text: First of all, I understand that from time to time one will get a bad product. To me, what differentiates good companies and products and bad companies/products is how they stand behind their products. My D7 was bad out of the box -- the LIDAR sensor would error out (error 4000) so frequently I was unable to complete a single run. Their tech support was beyond useless, all the way to insulting -- they were unable to provide any help beyond what I'd already online ("have you tried turning it on and off again?" "Can you try cleaning the sensors?" (shouldn't need to clean a BRAND NEW OUT OF BOX unit)
customer_reviews.author: CaliTechNerdCheerDad

customer_reviews.title: With so many robot vacs on the market, please consider another manufacturer.
customer_reviews.text: Not recommended until they work out the bugs. Purchased the new addition to the Neato line, the D7 Connected in May 2018. I used it daily and was delighted until mid August 2018 when the unit would not hold a charge. While the Neato customer service staff are cordial, the process, follow up, and resolution regarding this issue is requiring my continued follow up and attention. With so many robot vacs on the market, please consider another manufacturer.
customer_reviews.author: M Glavan

customer_reviews.title: Too glitchy to recommend
customer_reviews.text: Long time neato user here. Can’t recommend this model. It is glitchy and tries too hard to add features. My old neato was simple and never broke. This one can’t find its base some times and gets stuck often. Not sure how this is an improvement. Efforts to work with neato to replace it did not go well to say the least. They need to really focus on customer service improvements.
customer_reviews.author: Gearhed

customer_reviews.title: Convenient, easy to use, powerful and fun!
customer_reviews.text: The Neato D7 has been an awesome addition to our home. It was incredibly easy to set-up and quickly learned the nuances of our space. It has consistently picked up all dirt and other small objects in its path and can cover all 2k+ square feet in one single charge. I highly recommend this robot to anyone looking for this type of product.
customer_reviews.author: DK42

customer_reviews.title: Dream Machine!
customer_reviews.text: Amazing product. Our only issue is that we didn’t buy one years ago. We’ve had it for three weeks and run it daily. We have a four bedroom place with three late teen boys and two dogs, one of them awesome in every way including the shedding vast amounts of white hair. The D7 nails it . . . importanyly, including the dog hair. Super easy to use, cleans thoroughly and is relatively quiet. I am not sure what more one could ask of a robo vacuum. Our place looks so much cleaner with very little additional effort! We are very pleased that we did our research and chose this model.
customer_reviews.author: Ken H.

customer_reviews.title: Mixed results
customer_reviews.text: For the price I would like to say I love "Alfred", however I have gotten mixed results with the operation. Some days it is efficient and cleans with no issues. Then are days like today, where it hasn't finished the house because of getting stuck, wanted its rollers cleaned, etc. I am giving up for today don't have time to continue to track him down. May be tomorrow it will actually finish.....
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great Product
customer_reviews.text: Works great. I have it running 3 times a week and have had 0 issues. The jump from what’s offered on the D5 vs the D7, specifically the software, is invaluable. Love being able to section off no go areas and the ability to clean specific rooms.
customer_reviews.author: Michael Tillis

customer_reviews.title: Neato Robot will not charge, no lights-times two within 2 weeks!
customer_reviews.text: The first D7 Connected Robot arrived about 2 1/2 weeks ago. It would not charge, there were no LED lights lit up. I contacted tech support, and finally they sent me info to return it to a "repair" shop. Upon doing this I received a replacement on Wednesday 5 September. This one would not charge ,nor run, nor were there any LED lights. Attempted 3 different outlets etc. I called tech service once again on Thursday September 6. Same drill! But haven't an answer back yet. I would like/love to send it back for a refund. They don't work. The only reason the ratings were 1 star, there was nothing lower.
customer_reviews.author: William E. Kretzer

customer_reviews.title: Huge waste of money
customer_reviews.text: I have had nothing but problems with this robot. I do not recommend buying this robot buy a Roomba instead. Every time I want to use it it disconnects from the internet which makes it impossible to use. Save your money and either by a Roomba or a manual vacuum cleaner because this is a huge piece of garbage and I regret buying it and wish that I could get my money back. I will be calling the manufacturer tomorrow to express my concerns and demand that I get my money back because I'm sick of not being able to use something that I paid almost $800 for. Be warned do not buy this!
customer_reviews.author: Christie

customer_reviews.title: Best choice for multistory homes
customer_reviews.text: I selected neato after a great deal of research I wanted a vacuum that uses maps, could support a multistory home and used virtual no go zones I’m continually surprised how efficient the machine is, both in terms of the time it takes to run a lap around the floor and how much it picks up I never have herds of dust bunnies roaming the hardwood anymore I highly recommend it UPDATE- I can’t say enough good things about how great my Neato is It is incredibly dependable and consistently does a far better job cleaning up than I ever would Highly recommend it for anyone considering the purchase
customer_reviews.author: Eric I.

customer_reviews.title: You must!! Use the app in order to use no go lines!
customer_reviews.text: Had a Roomba 870 and figured I'd jump over to neato d7. This thing is a beast! I have mostly tile in my house along with some carpet in the bedrooms. This cleans my house perfectly, every time. Have two dogs and a cat. One thing that did trip me up is that the included charge base can be flacky, if you lose power I've had to unplug the base from the wall as the robot was not charging. After waiting about a minute and plugging the charger back in it would charge the battery perfectly. An easy for for this is to get an battery backup they are cheap and I've yet to have this problem since.
customer_reviews.author: lance wurzbacher

customer_reviews.title: For the CO$T, spend a little more and get a better vac ... I AM still  L ° ° KING!
customer_reviews.text: Compared to the "earlier" versions of other competitors (i.e. Room##, Eu##, etc.), it's a good vacuum; it should be because it i$ expen$ive! However, the "side-brush" is ridiculous! It can be "removed/replaced," however, because it is attached to a (internal, belt-driven) shaft containing a rather weak (earth) magnet, which upon inspection, it will 'stall' because the side-brush (shaft) spins within the plastic "hub" of the brush. The slightest resistance to the brush (i.e. baseboards, corner-cleaning, slight, finger-pressure) forgoes any attempt to sweep-the-edge ... that's why the the vac is shaped like the letter "D," so that it can get in the corners. The "mapping/scheduling" is dependable, and I like that is compatible with "Alexa." MUCH better than the "Samsu##" Robo-bot!
customer_reviews.author: DP in Dana Point, CA

customer_reviews.title: Worth every penny!
customer_reviews.text: This is life changing! I come home to clean floors, it is a dream come true. This has reduced the amount of time it takes me to clean.
customer_reviews.author: daisy rojas

customer_reviews.title: Easy to Use
customer_reviews.text: I debated whether to buy this device after the Christmas holiday given its price. My friends call me the gadget queen and this would be the ultimate in gadgets. I've only been using the Neato for two weeks now. I know that is not a lot of time, but I'll update this review as I continue to use it throughout 2019. Pros: Quiet; Easy to Use; Powerful - Amazing Suctioning (picks up so much that I'm always emptying the bin); Gentle Around Furniture; Easy to Understand and Use App Cons: Trouble Keeping Device Connected to my WiFI causing Neato to Miss Rooms;
customer_reviews.author: Alliecat61

customer_reviews.title: this works great.
customer_reviews.text: works as advertised and worth every penny. i don't know why it has a lot of 1 star review but it's been working well for me for a couple of weeks now. it cleans the whole house, doesn't get stuck on anything then returns to the base to charge.
customer_reviews.author: roberto jasmin

customer_reviews.title: A great tool and great service
customer_reviews.text: This is our second Neato botvac. This D7 replaces a botvac connected which is going to our son. The D7 has the ability to avoid certain areas by drawing no go lines on the house floor plan that the robot creates. It just works great! Support and service: I had an unusual operational event which I reported to neato support, and though duplication was not consistent, the support team was extremely patient and requested a return. A new replacement arrived in a couple days with no hassle. The Neato support team “gets” customer service, responds quickly to questions, and are knowledgeable and not script driven. Good machine and good service.....refreshing in today’s world.
customer_reviews.author: W

customer_reviews.title: D7 offline!!!
customer_reviews.text: Well, I just got my D7... worked great on living room, dining,kitchen, and part of my hall. The wifi on D7 goes offline once it crosses into hall where all the bedrooms are. So i was told to get an extender which I have and then D7 will NOT connect to wifi now. Keeps blinking. Router is working fine. Tried to reboot all over again....to no avail. Fraustrated!! Unhappy.
customer_reviews.author: adriana de leon

customer_reviews.title: I love this little workhorse!
customer_reviews.text: I love the second one as the first had some issues but the company replaced it with no problem. It was very easy to connect to WiFi 5G compared to other brands. The setup and getting it to work properly was a little more difficult but once done it works great. The powerful vacuum amazes me as it is comparable to a good upright vacuum. I have only had this a short while and that is why the four star rate on battery. I love this little workhorse and as long as it keeps working this way l’ll keep loving it!
customer_reviews.author: Nelson

customer_reviews.title: Great Product!
customer_reviews.text: The D7 worked great for about four (4) months. Then it stopped connecting to the internet. I contacted Neato support, and they were helpful in getting the D7 reconnected. I have had other robot vacuums and have given them away as they just do not do a good job. The D7 is GREAT, it is a little slow, but it does a great job. I would recommend this if product to anyone!
customer_reviews.author: Paul

customer_reviews.title: Exactly as advertised - love it!
customer_reviews.text: We have a D7 (Alice) for a little over a week now and it's definitely made our life easier. No go lines & zones are easy to set as well as the schedule. We have it scheduled to run every other day and definitely noticed a difference. It picks up our boxers shedding on both hardwood and carpeting without any issues. It did take about 2 to 3 full runs to complete the initial floorplan map, but once that was done everything easily fell into place. I've been actually raving about it to our family & friends and now my sister is interested in getting one. Highly recommended!!
customer_reviews.author: Silverscott

customer_reviews.title: One of the best products I have ever purchased. I would buy it again - worth the money!!!
customer_reviews.text: The customer Service and support i have received has been one of the best experiences i have ever had!!! I highly recommend this company and product. I have 5 big Australian Shepherd dogs and i live on a farm. The Neeto D7 botvac connected can handle all that on a daily (sometimes twice a day) basis without any issues. I am a customer for life and i can't live without this robot vacuum. It makes my life easier and saves me so much time out of my busy day. I work hard outside and the robot vacuum works hard inside for me."
customer_reviews.author: angie hagen - oregon farmgirl

customer_reviews.title: don't know how I lived without it
customer_reviews.text: Cleans the whole house (about 1300 sq ft ranch) in under 3 hours while I'm at work. I have an 80lb German Shepherd. Cleans my pergo dining room and living room, tile kitchen, 4 carpet bedrooms and hall. It makes a laser map of the whole house. It works very well. Is as cool as it is convenient.
customer_reviews.author: Michael T. Williams

customer_reviews.title: Neat--O
customer_reviews.text: Thanks to Neato I now own a $500 paper weight. I've only had this unit for about 2 days now and it refuses to work properly. The vacuum mapped the house once and now refuses to store the map or leave the base after the first run. Called Neato support and all they could tell me is that this is a new issue they've never heard of. Update: Neato has replaced my vacuum and the new one is working much better. Does a excellent job of cleaning my tile and carpets, even with 3 dogs and a 12 year old boy. Updating my review to 5 stars.
customer_reviews.author: Melissa Sweetland

customer_reviews.title: The Neato has surpassed all my expectations and is an excellent robot vac
customer_reviews.text: I bought this item to replace an iRobot Roomba 671 that I purchased on Prime Day and then returned. The Neato has surpassed all my expectations and is an excellent robot vac. It has excellent suction and does a great job picking up dirt and trash, and an even better job of navigating my home. I have one downstairs (about 1450 square feet) and am seriously thinking about buying a second for upstairs. It takes about 1.5 hours to clean the downstairs floors and it is usually completed on one charge.
customer_reviews.author: techguyga

customer_reviews.title: NEATO ROBOTICS D7 ROCK!!
customer_reviews.text: I'm very impressed Neato D7!! I call it Chico my new helper...Chico clean tiles flooring A+.. Neato D7 doesn't bump as much other Irobot Roomba 690.. I do like its map your flooring and have strong vacuum.. I have not use no-go lines, soon I will..Yes I do recommend to other...
customer_reviews.author: Mr. Luis M. Figueroa Jr.

customer_reviews.title: Love my Neato D7  Sam
customer_reviews.text: Love my Neato D7. I Was a nervous wreck spending so much on this. But i we on and done it and so far after 1 months use Im not disappointed, I love him and his name is Sam. He is a hard little worker and I love that he doesn't just bump into things but navigates around it. All I do is a quick check before I start him because we have pets and a teenager and I make sure there are no charging cords in the way. He does a great job on our dark brown shag carpet or our ceramic tile. If you are thinking about buying this product you won't go wrong.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Best purchase ever ⭐️
customer_reviews.text: I love this thing 💜, I have it programmed to go everyday. It literally makes me smile everytime I hear it start up. Can’t believe I haven’t gotten one of these sooner. We have 2 German Shepherds so we constantly have dog hair. Now our home no longer has dog hair rolling around.
customer_reviews.author: Lee

customer_reviews.title: Can’t seem to remember the network!
customer_reviews.text: This thing works as a vacuuming robot perfectly well, but the reason we bought the D7 was because it could be on the network, use maps, and so on. None of those things work half the time because it drops off the network frequently for no apparent reason. Putting it back on the network is a very time-consuming process that may or may not work. If they could iron out the bugs in the network connection stuff, I would be perfectly happy. But right now I feel like we got ripped off, since we paid several hundred dollars extra to have the network support.
customer_reviews.author: G. F. Boyer

customer_reviews.title: We love our Botvac
customer_reviews.text: We have 2 dogs and a long hair cat in a house with tile floors. I was sick of walking around with animal hair on my feet! We run our Botvac every night while we are sleeping and empty the bin each morning. We love our Botvac! Best money we've ver spent!
customer_reviews.author: S B

customer_reviews.title: Great robot vacuum
customer_reviews.text: First robot vacuum I've ever purchased. I'd purchase it again if needed. Easy to use phone app. Cleans my 300 square feet floor plan in 35 minutes. I have recommended this to anyone who is interested in not vacuuming. I run it while I'm away at work to avoid hearing the vacuum. My dog doesn't care for it, but it does a great job reducing the amount of hair floating around to a minimum. Cleaning of the device is easy. It takes 2 minutes to empty it and check for hairs around the beater bar.
customer_reviews.author: Trenton W. Schmidt

customer_reviews.title: Improved Support Levels.
customer_reviews.text: I spoke with NEATO Customer Support, we both have a better understanding of issue resolution. The unit I purchased had an infant mortality failure, this happens. I am replacing the D7 unit with the same unit. I like to concept of WiFi, and WiFi management. The conversation with Customer Support resulted in my increased understanding that additional training is happening and understanding of this new product. As one would want to hear, constant improvement is the goal.
customer_reviews.author: Michael R Rusnack

customer_reviews.title: Too cute
customer_reviews.text: I wish it would memorize multiple floors. Now I have to purchase 3 >:( I would mark it 4 stars because of that but its just too cute when it wiggles it butt when docking. Sucks up a surprising amount of dirt. I recommend if you want to reduce dust and you sneeze a lot.
customer_reviews.author: Andrew

customer_reviews.title: Lot's of connectivity issues...
customer_reviews.text: Amending this review to note that keeping Neato connected to the internet and servers is a chore. He'll drop off for days and need complete repairing with wifi. He's a part of the family now. Does a great job cleaning when we aren't home and carefully avoids the no go areas that are full of kids toys. We change the filters regularly because they get really dirty. Everyday he pulls almost a full container of dirt of the floors. He occasionally gets stuck but less frequently now as the house layout seems to have been learned.
customer_reviews.author: KB

customer_reviews.title: Best robo vac on the market
customer_reviews.text: Great vac! I love the constant software updates. It now has more features then when we bought it in Dec 2018. I can tell it to go clean the kitchen. It it will, just the kitchen. Battery life it good. It does about 800-950Sq ft on 1pass.if it not done, it will go on its base, charge up and finish the job. The bin is easy to empty and clean. Same with the brush. No tools needed. We have a dog and kid and 2 adults. It does a great job keeping the floors clean. I have it on schedule for every other day. No issues. Best purchase I made in a while.
customer_reviews.author: glockgirl

customer_reviews.title: Love my Neato D7
customer_reviews.text: I love my Neato D7. It does a great job and mapped my house really well. I love that I can have the Neato clean sections of my house using the Neato app. It is great to have my floors vacuumed every day, they always look great. With two dogs there is a never ending supply of dog hair and the Neato picks it up very well. The Neato will never replace an upright vacuum on carpet. It doesn’t have that kind of suction but I don’t have to vacuum as often.
customer_reviews.author: janet c

customer_reviews.title: Great first time robot vacuum - trouble around cables
customer_reviews.text: First time having a robot vaccum and its worth it. This gets the job done but id say itll be tricky if you have rugs since it moves them around and might get stuck. Also, it can’t really navigate around cables, so it gets stuck on those too so be aware in case you’re a newbie too. overall, i think its a great buy if youre looking for a high quality vacuum with a solid price. And cleaning/emptying the vacuum is SUPER easy, so you really dont need the super new Roomba with the auto suction which just pulls more money from you.
customer_reviews.author: Li

customer_reviews.title: Not yet there
customer_reviews.text: The robot is clunky. At first it seems to work ok, but when used over and over uncovers a lot of issues. First of all, when out of power - it loses wifi connectivity, it took me awhile to figure out reconnection, resetting process - it's not smooth. If you have low profile furniture, it will get stuck under it at times. If you have a lot of chairs, it won't clean well. In terms of AI sensing, it would go over certain areas again and again, but would leave other areas unclean. Overall, I decided I do not want to own this product.
customer_reviews.author: Kiryl Mauryshchau

customer_reviews.title: Love this for our two big dogs!
customer_reviews.text: It works great! I change my filter more often then they say because we have two big dogs. They are continually updating the software so it does glitch a little after the updates.
customer_reviews.author: Mike and Evey

customer_reviews.title: Love It!
customer_reviews.text: Love it! Don’t know how I survived without it. Did lots of research. Family had the roomba that kept running into everything. Neato masters ensure it never shuts the walls or furniture. Just comes very very close. Was a breeze to setup. Not sure why other reviews saw WiFi issues. Mine worked perfectly the first time.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Strong little vacuum
customer_reviews.text: This device was easy to set up! It has a surprisingly powerful vacuum and captures a lot of the pet hair. It’s methodical approach is something, that I believe, allows it to be so effective. I highly recommend it!
customer_reviews.author: Michael Mallory

customer_reviews.title: Poor quality and easy to confuse
customer_reviews.text: A few observations. I've been a Neato user for past few years, and this is the second model purchased (first was D80). Poor quality: After just over a month, the side brush stopped functioning. Easy to confuse: The botvac is supposed to save a floor plan once it runs with barriers set up (e.g., closed doors) and then use it thereafter. However, the botvac is endlessly needing to create a new floorplan. This prevents the automated running of the unit, and we end up needing to listen to the noisy vacuum when trying to study and work. It defeats much of the purpose of having this unit.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: We named him Bruce :)
customer_reviews.text: What a smart little dude! We had a cheaper version from another company and it would always get stuck places... this one rarely gets stuck, and if he does it’s usually our fault for moving furniture or leaving stuff out on the floor. Does a great job cleaning, works well with the app, and easy to empty the trash bin (after I had to google where the bin even was haha). Pricey but worth it
customer_reviews.author: Alex K.

customer_reviews.title: Great product until warranty expired..
customer_reviews.text: Loved the product and no go lines, but the product stopped working after less than 2 years and neato just shrugged their shoulders and said sorry it’s out of warranty. A consumer product this expensive should not become a paper weight after less then 18 months Have the old D80 that is still going after 5 years
customer_reviews.author: Mburns0128

customer_reviews.title: Works great. Suction really strong
customer_reviews.text: Works great on our house which is 1500 square feet. Cleans better than we though the it would. Didn’t go under our couches so had to raise them but fits under other furniture.
customer_reviews.author: Antonio

customer_reviews.title: Love Love Love
customer_reviews.text: I love the Neato Robotic D7 vacuum. I noticed a difference in the floor immediately (we left it natural -that means dirty- for a while before using it so we could see how well it worked). I have it set to do a different room each night/early morning while we sleep. It is keeping it clean. So Happy.....!!!!!
customer_reviews.author: JDRC

customer_reviews.title: Best purchase ever!!!
customer_reviews.text: After extensive research I decided to purchase the Neato D7 because it seemed like it would be the best one for my floor plan. I have a 3,200 sq. ft. home with different floor levels with tile and wood floors and so far I am very impressed. It gets to know your floor plan and adding different zones it’s super easy. Set up was super easy as well.
customer_reviews.author: Carmen

customer_reviews.title: Amazing vacuum!
customer_reviews.text: The D7 has an extra care mode that works well and didn’t damage my furniture or my blinds. Additionally, the virtual boundary lines worked perfectly to keep the D7 off some rugs and out of some rooms. Overall the D7 exceeded my expectations and I would highly recommend it. I’m so glad I returned the Roomba 980 and purchased the D7.
customer_reviews.author: RZ

customer_reviews.title: Like having a cleaning partner
customer_reviews.text: I am rating the Neato D7 as a 5 star product. Admittedly, I returned the original purchase due to its having issues finding the docking station. I then ordered a Roomba and a Shark IQ (the latter from a local vendor). Of the three robotic vacuums I trialed, I was most pleased with the Neato D7. I ultimately purchased a second Neato from a local vendor due to a 20% coupon offer. It is thorough; and after large family gatherings, I vacuum upstairs and Neato does the lower level.
customer_reviews.author: MARZI

customer_reviews.title: Unsecure for WiFi
customer_reviews.text: WARNING: Neato does not clearly say that the D7 only works on WPA or WPA2 WiFi. Also, your WiFi password must not contain any special characters or spaces e.g. !"£$%^&*(). The password needs to be alphanumeric, in some cases the SSID (network name) may need to be changed if it also contains special characters. These settings make your WiFi susceptible to hacking.
customer_reviews.author: seahawk

customer_reviews.title: Not recommended
customer_reviews.text: Just too many issues. The docking station placement is so sensitive, windows, corners, 1/4 inch movement, whatever, that I cannot find a spot in my home that doesn't cause problems for the robot. A call to support is answered immediately, great, but they just tell me to find another spot. The only spot I can think of now is the trash. It is fun to watch the thing find it's way around the rooms, but it constantly sends notifications that it needs help. If you cannot vacuum your home yourself, hire a person, any person. They will do it better with less calls for help.
customer_reviews.author: HarryK

customer_reviews.title: Quit just before the 1 year mark
customer_reviews.text: When it works it cleans great. That being said it stopped working one week before the one year mark and now I’m having to send it in for repairs. Not what I was expecting for a $600 vacuum. Our previous neato we had for a few years before we had to have it repaired. Update: after reaching out to Neato the vacuum was sent for repairs and this was at no charge to me. They even changed my brush, filter, cleaned it, and fixed the lose piece of plastic in the bottom. It looks like new and runs great. I’m very pleased!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great when it works, 3 years and I've had 2 replacement vacuums
customer_reviews.text: The Neato D7 is awesome when it works, however, it only has a lifespan of approximately a year. I've already had to send it back twice for replacements and my most recent replacement vacuums has died and my one year warranty has run out. This is one of the more pricey robots on the market and I would expect that it would have a lifespan of greater than a year. disappointing.
customer_reviews.author: Jessica Michaels

customer_reviews.title: This thing dose not work!
customer_reviews.text: I thought a robot vac. was a labor saving device, but with this device I spent half a day getting it to work and maybe it would work for two or three days then go brain dead not be able to clean things it had cleaned for a week or two. In short it was a total flop, I could send it in for repair but being 75 and told by a heart doctor I will be dead in two years I do not have time. Every time you moved something it would go nuts, I guess if you wanted to be a statue and not cross your legs or eyes it might work!!!
customer_reviews.author: Dwight H. Gregg

customer_reviews.title: It’s amazing how well it works, and how stupid it can be. Yelling at it doesn’t help either.
customer_reviews.text: When its good its very good. But if it gets stuck or lost it never quite recovers. It will skip entire sections of the floor plan. But if it doesn’t get stuck - trips over a wire, gets fooled by a floor heat cold air return duct, wedges itself into a corner and yells for help - its been my experience that it will complete the task as expected, even if it has to return home to recharge first. The setting of zones needs some work. If it cannot find how to get to the zone, say misses going down a narrow hallway, then all bets are off.
customer_reviews.author: M1n1fan

customer_reviews.title: 2 years later and works great
customer_reviews.text: I do not understand all the bad reviews. Maybe 1 of 2 things are happening (or both). Perhaps Neato has bad quality control and I happened to get a good unit. Or, seeing as most complaints are about connectivity, a lot of you people have terrible WiFi. I have had the D7 almost 2 years and I run it daily. I have run it hundreds of times and it has been stuck only 5 or 6 times. I think the app and no go lines are great. When Neato comes out with an upgrade I’ll get that and give the D7 to someone in my family.
customer_reviews.author: csuDude

customer_reviews.title: One of, if not the best, botvac as of 2018
customer_reviews.text: Stepped up from an older basic Neato to this Connected model. Love the WiFi and app capabilities. Works with amazon with a Neato Skill. The original unit I received did have an issue with WiFi. Neato customer support was very effective st helping diagnose the issue to be the unit had a WiFi low signal reception issue. Within a week if this I received a new replacement unit. All the WiFi and App configurations and functions could be a bit much for less tech savvy people so I dropped a couple Ease of Use stars. PS. Also, It Sucks! *rimshot* ;)
customer_reviews.author: Dan

customer_reviews.title: Work good but poor mechanical quality and warranty service
customer_reviews.text: Works great when it works. It is a high maintenance device. Had to replace a side brush belt which requires nearly a complete disassembly. It was not designed to be serviceable. Now the gear is worn out on the main brush and will not spin the brush—still under warranty but 404 web page not found when you try to make a claim so ordered a new motor gear now. The electronics and software work nice but mechanically it is poor quality and durability.
customer_reviews.author: Tim Hopper

customer_reviews.title: Generally I really like this unit
customer_reviews.text: Generally I really like this unit. It does have a few quirks you have to work through and honestly it doesn't really cover the amount of area it says it will cover without having to be emptied at least twice (I have a dog) and going back for at least one recharge. I will certainly be keeping it and I think it cleans better than the Roomba we had before.
customer_reviews.author: DigitalMan

customer_reviews.title: Lol It does not do windows!
customer_reviews.text: There is no better look then to leave for work and to see clean floors when you return home. It leaves great looking lines in carpet and dust free hard wood floors. Cons: 1. Absolutely nothing on the floor that could get caught in the beater bar. That includes shoe laces, cheap bathroom rugs, rugs with long tassels, electrical cords to lamps and alarm clocks. 2. The vacuum will not run if the dust bin full. Just reminding you that it does require some attention. 3. It does bump on walls and get paint residue on the sides. visually unappealing to see a 800 dollar machine with scuff marks.
customer_reviews.author: Darrin K. Smith

customer_reviews.title: Poor Performance and loud
customer_reviews.text: I've had my Neato D7 for less than a year,.. I keep the brush clean and the dustbin emptied. The vacuum is very loud on my hardwood floor, no carpet in my house. Lately getting a constant brush needs cleaned error, won't reset or clear, even though it is clean and verified cleaned. It also seems to lose track on where it is and needs to be picked up and set back down,.. that or it just wants attention. Overall, not too happy with this product, especially for the price, will not purchase again.
customer_reviews.author: Jeff Worthen

customer_reviews.title: Completely clueless robo-vac
customer_reviews.text: Completely clueless vacuum. Had one unit replaced, because the original one jumped off the stairs. The replacement unit did the same, only much, much worse damage. This robo-vac is probably the dumbest robo-vac I’ve ever had. Despite all its “advanced” navigation systems, it’s as clueless as the robo-vacs without any of those. Constantly gets lost in the middle of wide open spaces. In the more then 1.5 years I’ve had it, it actually finished the job in probably 4 out of 10 cases. For comparison, I also have iRobot’s Braava robo-mop. This one had never failed so far. And it’s pretty dumb (it doesn’t know anything about any floor plans and such).
customer_reviews.author: Dmitry Nikiforov

customer_reviews.title: Dont Buy - Does not work long
customer_reviews.text: This worked fine for the initial 5 months, then started having problems with sensors & wifi . Have performed all maintenance checks as required like cleaning sensors, replacing consumable parts etc, but it just wont work. Netos customer care service / warranty support is the worst. Can never get a straight response - its always check this, reset that, send a picture of the area .. what crap.
customer_reviews.author: Anant

customer_reviews.title: No, don’t do it
customer_reviews.text: I have had this vacuum for about two years and for something this pricey, I would have hoped it would have lasted longer. The vacuum still picks up everything, no problem. The navigation is horrible. I’ve moved the docking station, erased the map, created a new map, tried to using it without the map. I also talked to Neato customer service and sent it in for repair and got it back. It will not clean more than three rooms at a time. Super frustrating.
customer_reviews.author: Lili Train

customer_reviews.title: Starts out great & quickly goes downhill.
customer_reviews.text: Started out a 5 star and went steadily downhill with every software update and use. It gets stuck on barstools, powercords, gets lost in the house (even after mapping), will sit and ram itself into corners repeatedly. The corner brush stopped working after a month. The unit itself is loud and squeaky. I don’t understand how people can sleep through it vacuuming. It originally took about 1.5-2hrs to do my house now it takes around 6 hours. Don’t waste your money or time with this machine.
customer_reviews.author: K. Stock

customer_reviews.title: Driving me crazy!
customer_reviews.text: After several tries to get a map and save it to set up zone and no go lines. It just doesn’t work. I have followed the instructions to the letter. I’m so disappointed! I wanted this to work. Everything is fine except to app. It sucks. Now I just came back from vacation and now the Neato is off line and I can’t get to work at all. I would like to return this to Amazon. I am 78 years old and I can’t handle the frustration of working with this! As a long time Prime customer please allow me to return this.
customer_reviews.author: Robert E. Stewart

customer_reviews.title: I love it!!!  So very worth it!
customer_reviews.text: Before I bought this one... I had purchased another brand ..and quickly sent it back! I then did more research and upped the amount that I was will to pay and chose this one! I really love it! The dust/dirt canister is bigger than most and that alone is a game changer! It's a lot "smarter" than the previous brand I bought and you "remembers" very well. The suction on this: you can choose which type you want .... "regular or turbo"! Either one you decide upon does a fantastic job!
customer_reviews.author: Karol Waro

customer_reviews.title: Horrible product, frustrating customer service
customer_reviews.text: This is our second new D7. The first one didn't work straight out of the box. The replacement has worked properly about every 5th run. Constantly getting lost, stopping and shutting off. So frustrating especially for the over $700 price! My wife hates this piece of crap. We have a house full of automation and high tech devices and have a high level of familiarity with smart devices and their quirks. This device is just a high priced test in patience without reward! I hope we can return otherwise I might set fire to it.
customer_reviews.author: mike Morris

customer_reviews.title: Don't buy refurbished, but the new product is amazing.
customer_reviews.text: Deleted bad review based on a broken refurbished product. The replacement product arrived and the bot itself works anazingly well. This is easily the best, most practical robot vacuum on the market today.
customer_reviews.author: Brett

customer_reviews.title: product would not start up
customer_reviews.text: After buying another Neato from Bestbuy, I discovered that the first Neato I received had been worked on and possibly used. When unpacking the first Neato, a filter was missing, battery compartment was broken, and plastic wrapping was missing. This leads me to believe this machine was shipped knowingly damaged. I did contact Neato rep. He said to send it to them and they would repair it and send it back to me. I decided to go through Amazon using their return policy which was the best choice. Amazon protects their customers against this type of problem.
customer_reviews.author: Watered Out

customer_reviews.title: Great battery life, good suction, easy to clean.
customer_reviews.text: Amazing device. This is my first robotic vacuum, was a little hesitant about the investment but it was worth every penny. I have about 2,400 sq ft and it cleans it in about 1:20 minutes. Since i have 2 kids i usually make it go twice on cleaning day, the bin is big enough for me to turn it on and not have to clean it mid cycle. Definitely thinking about getting the robotic mop. P.S: my wife went after it one day with a swiffer, and it came back clean. So it passed the test.
customer_reviews.author: Aristides Rodriguez

customer_reviews.title: Great helper! Totally recommend!
customer_reviews.text: Suction power is really good, I am amazed! But it is noisy though, so get it setup to clean when you are sleeping or not home. Battery life is okay, but it returns to the charging station on its own to charge and then gets to clean/work on its own, so that part is okay. Definitely it has made my life easier esp if you have a dog that sheds a lot. It picks up all of my dogs hair from our floor (we have tiles). So far it hasn't missed any spot. Overall, it is very good and I recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: Hemjot Kaur

customer_reviews.title: Scheduling, mapping, all autonomous functions bug-ridden.
customer_reviews.text: Had a Botvac Connect. Upgraded to D7 to get mapping and better scheduling. Hardware is good, software is erratic, and support is ineffectual. Cleaning schedule keeps changing itself, won't accept corrections. Map-based cleaning loads wrong map areas, then cleans then. Constantly looses its base location. Support blamed all problems on change to daylight saving time, told me to wait a week! If you buy anything from Neato, get the low-end product. As a minimally autonomous vacuum cleaner it's OK.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Excellent product support!
customer_reviews.text: This is my second Neato. The earlier one (Mod. XV) is still running after a decade and I have replaced batteries, a dust bin sensor, brushes, etc. That one's only negative issue is the dust bin sensor. My new one, a D7 Connected, is a dream. Works well and the no-go lines work well. It is quieter and cleans better - with a larger dust bin capacity. After using it once, the side-brush stopped spinning. No big deal. I contacted their support group asking permission to open it up to inspect the mechanism. Not only were they courteous, they shipped me a new unit (which I didn't expect and appreciate.
customer_reviews.author: Cliff A. Spirock

customer_reviews.title: Does the job
customer_reviews.text: I was looking for a robot that would do shag carpet, high pile carpet, tile floors, and hardwood. Also wanted an efficient navigation system. Tried the I Robot 960 But it could not handle these requirements I decided to give this unit a try and I am very happy with the results. Not only does it handle the different floor surfaces you can also add no go lines ans zone cleaning. The battery life is very much better than the I Robot as you get 2 full hours of cleaning. Highly recommend this product
customer_reviews.author: Joe

customer_reviews.title: Send in to repair at your own risk
customer_reviews.text: Would not purchase again. The vacuum when it worked it worked well. I had to send mine under warranty in for repairs, the side brush had stopped spinning. After waiting several weeks I called to check the status of the repair and they could not provide me any information other then they had received it and would be contacting me with the status which they never did. I have called back several time only to get the same results as above. I asked to speak to a Manager and they said one would call me back and they never did.
customer_reviews.author: ron j

customer_reviews.title: Excellent job!
customer_reviews.text: I do not know why the box is resealed. The customer service give some refund since I need to use it in urgent. I highly recommend this. The result is as expected. I read a lot of review article to decide whether Neato or iRobot. Neato indeed have excellent navigate technique. The app is easy to be used. It saves a lot of time for me. I have already continue to use it every morning for three days, there is always more dust than I expected.
customer_reviews.author: miu miu

customer_reviews.title: Unfortunately only good for a year
customer_reviews.text: We really liked our first Neato D7, so we bought two (one upstairs and one down)! Unfortunately, the laser navigation stopped working on one of them. Neato replaced it with another and I thought all was well. 4 months later, the replacement robot stated making loud noises and would stop saying it was “stuck”. I went back a forth with customer service for nearly a month until I escalated and they agreed to fix it. Mailed the robot in and got the same one back (not fixed). Save yourself the trouble and buy a roomba. I had one previously that was a tank. Neato seems to build robots that are good for a year and then they start to die.
customer_reviews.author: Brandon J. Sos

customer_reviews.title: Not durable - Don’t waste your money
customer_reviews.text: For the first couple months the Neato worked great but the parts begin to fail quickly. I had to replace the sensors several times and almost every moving part. I have spent several hundred dollars on replacement parts. The Neato completely stopped working after a year of use. For the price of the product you should expect several years of use. The Neato is one of the worst purchases I have made over the past several years.
customer_reviews.author: Tommy McDonald

customer_reviews.title: Better than Roomba, not better than our old D85
customer_reviews.text: We started with a Neato D85 and loved it. It died after 2 years and heavy use. We tried a couple different Roombas and none worked as well as our Neato, so we got this newest model. Other than the convenience of the WiFi capability, it doesn’t seem worth the money spent. In fact, it doesn’t seem to clean quite as well as our original Neato did. Again, still better than the Roombas we tried that were comparable in price to the D7.
customer_reviews.author: Kate T

customer_reviews.title: Don’t buy it
customer_reviews.text: Utter junk. It misses entire rooms. The no-go lines feature is terribly designed and unuseable.
customer_reviews.author: David Smith

customer_reviews.title: Easy set up and quiet vacuum when home
customer_reviews.text: It was easy to set up and it finds its way around, haven’t see it being stuck and its a nice thing to see the map of the house when it finishes in the map giving you a view of places that it cleaned. Setting up a schedule is easy and nice thing to do having cleaning after I leave work or right before I return just incase it gets stuck wich it hasn’t happen.
customer_reviews.author: Angel D. Discua

customer_reviews.title: Works great and excellent customer service
customer_reviews.text: This is my 2nd Neato. I love this new one to be able to create zones and add “no go” lines. Plus, control it all from my phone and tablet. I was having issues creating my first floor plan zone. I contacted customer service, they walked me through the process, sent me an email with step by step instructions and followed up with me in insure I was satisfied. They truly do have excellent customer service!
customer_reviews.author: Karen J Woodall

customer_reviews.title: We love our Neato!
customer_reviews.text: I have already recommended it to family, this vacuum is life changing. We chose it instead of a Roomba and are really enjoying the mapping features, it’s ability to run without lights on, the spatial mapping, and that Neato protects our privacy which isn’t promised with iRobot. The filter design could be improved as other reviewers said, but it definitely works well climbing and cleaning. Emptying the dustbin without having to manually vacuum is very satisfying!
customer_reviews.author: K G

customer_reviews.title: This little guy sucks...that's a good thing...it's a robot vacuum cleaner!
customer_reviews.text: We've had this D7 for just under 2 years and it's worked great. We've setup the virtual boundaries and never once has it tried to escape. Only once did it try and eat a sandal but if you keep things off of the floor that could tangle it up (eg. shoe laces, usb cables, etc...) your little robot should do a great job keeping the house tidy. We have our robot connected to Alexa and they work together well. We have been really happy with our purchase. We did have the battery die but Neato covered it under warranty and took care of things quickly with no hassle at all. Great customer support!
customer_reviews.author: Richard M.

customer_reviews.title: Great Vacuum with excellent features
customer_reviews.text: Excellent no-go line feature and zone cleaning. Had robot for 1 year and now has 450 charge cycles. Still performs like new. Bought (2) more robots to clean different floors in house so I don't need to move them around. Some patience required to do initial mapping and make the floor robot-friendly but after that I have the entire house cleaned better than a human would normally want to. It takes work to clean the robot thoroughly, so depending on how dirty (dogs) will dictate how often you need to empty and clean brushes.
customer_reviews.author: rna

customer_reviews.title: Stopped working after a week. Best vacuum for a week
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely loved this vacuum, for a week. It worked perfectly. I did run into slight problems cuz I don't have wifi, just a hot spot when I'm home, so I couldn't run it on a program. But then.... It was a week or not even a week and it broke. The censor on top malfunctioned and nothing I did, Amazon help, or neato help couldn't fix it. Returned it
customer_reviews.author: Natalie Wartick

customer_reviews.title: It vacuums my house while I am at work.
customer_reviews.text: Be mindful of the Neato's limitations. In some cases you may want to 'prep' a room before having Neato clean it. No go lines allow you to keep Neato away from areas that may cause problems for Neato. My advice would be to run Neato in your home and watch him carefully. take note of things that gave him issues and fix them if possible. If it is something that simply can't be 'fixed' then use no go lines to have him avoid it. Once you have your home set up for Neato, cleaning becomes effortless.
customer_reviews.author: John

customer_reviews.title: Very thorough job!
customer_reviews.text: I like the product very much. Especially like the fact that two of the corners are square so it gets into the corners to clean. Customer support was very helpful when I ran into an issue connecting to my wireless. Very patient and knowledgable.
customer_reviews.author: Patricia B. Moore

customer_reviews.title: Always Running!
customer_reviews.text: Loved my Neato until it just stopped working. Just bought in Dec 2018 & now it won't power on at all. *Update: Neato support was very helpful & got it running again the same day I called in.
customer_reviews.author: MRP202

customer_reviews.title: Performs well, but has some issues
customer_reviews.text: Have had a few robots before and as for cleaning this one wins the title. However it has quirks that have yet to be resolved. There is a known issue that prevents this model from being operated in manual mode. We have had to send it back once because the driver gear for the brush failed. It now has a issue that it can’t follow the floor plan or gets lost during cleaning, sending it back again for that to be fixed. Customer service from the company has been good and accommodating
customer_reviews.author: GLN-JK

customer_reviews.title: REPEATEDLY broken within 1 month
customer_reviews.text: We have replaced a total of 3 of these... broken within a month of first use. Horrible, horrible investment. Waste of money. Might as well burn it instead. Less hassle and back and forth with support and more entertaining too. Updated... We have now replaced a total of SIX (6) of these units. This is a HORRIBLE product. Stay away, far away!
customer_reviews.author: Casa M Spice Co

customer_reviews.title: Schedule doesn't work
customer_reviews.text: Schedule without floor plan doesn't work, customer support doesn't help, floor plan error every day. I give up. On my opinion D80 was the best model. I don't understand why neato can working properly with wifi only??? Hi tech garbage in one word.
customer_reviews.author: Vik Che

customer_reviews.title: 6 month life span
customer_reviews.text: Purchased in April 2018. It’s now January 2019. The vacuum worked great when i first got it. Even with regular cleaning of the vacuum itself, always making sure it’s in good working order, the vacuum just stopped working like it used to. When I am able to get it going after countless resets, it still does a descent job at cleaning, it’s just a lot louder and it does miss spots or even entire areas here and there. Seems like at the 6 month point, things just start going bad with this vacuum. I don’t think I got my moneys worth.
customer_reviews.author: Kamil L.

customer_reviews.title: Great when it works
customer_reviews.text: It works great. The app features works great and easy to use. The no go lines are my favorite. My robot cleans about 1000sq ft in an hour. And it did a great job and helped maintain the dust and hair in my house. But....I’ve had to get it repaired twice in one year. One time the side brush stopped spinning. Then the main brush stripped out. I’m satisfied with the robot when it works but now with only a one year warranty I’m going to have to move to a different brand
customer_reviews.author: Jared Caudill

customer_reviews.title: Don’t do it!
customer_reviews.text: $700 paper weight. This thing is pointless. Gets stuck on everything. You have to be there when it’s running because you have to constantly get it unstuck. It never finds the dock and goes in circles running the battery down. Then you have to physically move to the dock. Takes forever and it’s loud. I could vacuum, dust and mop before this thing gets 2 rooms done. I waited too long to return. I own it now. Makes me mad to look at it. Just collects dust. Our internet connection is constantly down. Frustrated and I waited to long to return.
customer_reviews.author: Dean P.

customer_reviews.title: No regrets
customer_reviews.text: Love our robot vacuum we named "Bob". I vacuumed the day before we set him up and his dust bin still was full after the 1st cleaning! "Bob" runs everyday and every day we have to empty the bin because it's full. I don't know where it gets all of the dirt and fur daily (full disclosure we have 2 dogs)
customer_reviews.author: Scarletrae

customer_reviews.title: Quite bogus — randomly
customer_reviews.text: Some days it runs smoothly as it should, but sometimes it's a dumb machine getting stuck on spots that used to be okay. Sometimes it loops for a long while cleaning the same area again and again (for example the around the island in the kitchen). Sometimes it enters a kind of crazy mode going back and forth until you move it a bit (check attached videos). The app and features are overall quite good but kind of anti-intuitive, however, they become useless if the machine fails to run normally. The so-advertised lidar seems to not be helping so much when the machine goes crazy.
customer_reviews.author: Alberto Nakaya__

customer_reviews.title: Great Customer Service
customer_reviews.text: We've had our Neato for a year now. It performs on a daily basis with no problems. After a year of use, the belt for the side brush must of broke, but Neato's customer service was on top of it. They were friendly and quick. I had my Neato D6 back within 5 days. I was impressed. I am amazed at how much this machine will pick up. It has good suction power, but make sure you pick up your socks. It will notify you when something is wrong. Once it has a map of the house, you can add no-go lines for areas that are off limits. We are very pleased with the performance of this machine.
customer_reviews.author: Rebecca Shackelford

customer_reviews.title: Bought from Amazon Warehouse- PIECE OF JUNK.
customer_reviews.text: What a piece of $&/@.. Mapping? Lmao. Intelligent? Lmao. Sent it specifiy to a particular zone. Goes everywhere BUT that zone. No go lines? Lmao. It literally pushes the magnetic strips out of its way. I got mine from warehouse deals, so MAYBE that's why? But overall this exact machine is a piece of junk. Returning and purchasing a new one this time to see if this one just got dropped on its head as a baby or it's mother did drugs.
customer_reviews.author: Kristen Vincent

customer_reviews.title: DO NOT WASTE YOUR MONEY. It can not clean as much as roomba’s basic model
customer_reviews.text: I choose the neato’s latest model but it is The worst, most stupid item ever I have bought . It always stuck like on the video everywhere that there was no any think block it. And stucking, and dancing there more than 10 minutes. I replaced that but second one has same problem too. Since I have bought that it never cleaned up in avareage. Never connot retturn to the charge base. I bought roomba 685 before but it had been making more better job than Neato. Neaoto can not clean the edges corners like a junk produck ever .So I ‘m really soooo dissapointed .
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

product_meta.title: Neato Robotics D7 Connected Laser Guided Robot Vacuum Featuring Multiple Floor Plan Mapping and Zone Cleaning, Works with Amazon Alexa, Silver/Black
product_meta.description: Take your cleaning further with the Neato Botvac D7 connected. With lasers mapping and Navigation it covers more area in less time, moving around your house logically—not randomly. New zone cleaning lets you pinpoint trouble areas you want to clean more frequently. Turbo mode provides an extra powerful clean picking up debris you can't see, while the robotic D-Shape design tracks down dirt in corners and along walls better than others. The BotVac D7 is super smart, remembering multiple floor plans and letting you create no-go lines on each, so your Robot knows where not to go. And it keeps getting smarter, so you’re first to have the latest features. With up to two hours of battery life, the BotVac D7 is perfect for even the largest homes.
feature_bullets: Corner-cleaning ‘D’ design -- round robots can’t reach corners, and corners are where the worst dirt hides. Our industry-leading design gets you a complete floor clean
Laser-guided mapping -- D7 technology intelligently navigates and maps your home, cleaning in straight lines instead of a random pattern -- for a better clean
Floor cleaning for carpets, hardwood, kitchen tiles -- equally powerful and effective on every surface. Dustbin Capacity - 0.7 liters. Battery Charge Time - Up to 150 minutes
Alexa - Google Home - Echo -- integrates with smart home systems
Cleaning customization -- No-Go Lines, multiple floors maps, Zone Cleaning for extra-attention areas
Lithium Ion Battery -- 120 minutes of cleaning time, designed to cover the whole house
Intuitive & Easy. Neato’s advanced engineering is all under the hood. What you get is complete vacuuming at the touch of a button.
Pet hair specialist -- imagine your floors without pet hair. Neato has a 70% larger brush than leading round robots, proven to remove more pet hair

specifications.Customer Reviews: 3.9 out of 5 stars1,584 ratings3.9 out of 5 stars
specifications.Included Components: D7 Vacuum, Ultra Performance Filter, Spiral Combo Brush, Side Brush, charge base, power cord, cleaning tool and boundary markers
